amendment.description: Amendment requires the cohesive wildland fire management strategy in the bill to include among its elements a system to assess the impacts of climate change on the frequency and severity of wildland fires.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-52 to require the cohesive wildland fire management strategy required in the bill to include among its elements a system to assess the impacts of climate change on the frequency and severity of wildland fire.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heinrich amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
